message: Hello, I'm a developer based in Japan Hukuoka!
name: Yuuki Noumura
about: I am an engineer in my fourth year of university, based in Fukuoka, Japan. I mainly use react for the frontend, and ruby on rails for the backend. In my company, I mainly work on web development for marketing tools. Currently, I am studying to develop mobile apps.  I also love muscle training. Engineering and muscle training are my reasons for living.

bio.highSchool: Graduated from Hiroshima Shinjo High School.
bio.university: Completed the Bachelor's Program in the Graduate School of Seinan College University. (西南学院大学学士課程)
bio.atworked: Participate in an internship at UKIYOcreate! Japan (month 12)
